title: VPC Flow Logs Deleted
description: Identifies the deletion of VPC Flow Logs. Flow logs are essential for network traffic analysis and forensic investigation. Deleting them is a common precursor to network-based attacks/exfiltration to hide traffic patterns.
author: Antigravity
false_positives: Cost optimization scripts removing unused flow logs (verify target VPC)
recommendation: Confirm if the deletion was authorized. Without flow logs, you cannot trace network connection attempts or data exfiltration volume.
